meanings.sent1: Every morning, she breakfasted on toast and eggs.
meanings.sent2: He always breakfasted before starting his day.
meanings.sent3: The cat breakfasted on the leftovers from the table.
meanings.sent4: The sun breakfasted the world with its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: The birds breakfasted joyfully on the seeds scattered in the garden.

meanings.sent1: Before the meeting, they breakfasted together at the cafe.
meanings.sent2: She breakfasted with her family on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The dog breakfasted on the fallen crumbs from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The city breakfasted on the energy of its bustling streets.
meanings.sent5: The travelers breakfasted early to catch the sunrise on their journey.
